summary: Either if you\'re a Game of Thrones fan, or a furry... This is the mod for you! (or if you just like giant f***ing wolves, this could also be the mod for you. :D)
descriptionHtml:
[line]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FE1r7zQ.png[/img]
[line]
[size=4][color=1cb6e8][font=\"Impact\"]Either if you\'re a Game of Thrones fan, or a furry... This is the mod for you! (or if you just like giant f***ing wolves, this could also be the mod for you. :D)

Feralis is basically a giant wolf, that you can ride like a horse. He is about the size of any regular old horse, and will fight for you, but NOT follow you. After you dismount Feralis, he will walk back to the stables in Whiterun, no f***s given.

[line]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JpxBnzB.png[/img]
[line]

Installation is always easy if you have Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) so go and get that if you don\'t have it, it will make your modding experience 10 times easier. If you still refuse to not get NMM, you can install manually, just drop the .bsa and .esp into your data folder in your skyrim directory.

[line]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sFpz9z5.png[/img]
[line]

If you like this mod, please endorse! It helps me out a lot and give me motivation to keep modding. This mod will be up both on the Skyrim Nexus and the Steam Workshop so go crazy you babies. Check out my other mods here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

[center][youtube]fR7BEM2daGA[/youtube][/center]
[center]Video by [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/Gruntlock]Gruntlock[/url][/center]

Thanks![/size][/font][/color]
author: billmineface
